name: Breadinner Badge
description: Awarded for opening the game for the first time. You've risen to the occasion ‚Äî just like freshly baked bread!

name: Golden Bread
description: A rare and shiny loaf of bread forged from pure gold. This isn‚Äôt just any bread ‚Äì it‚Äôs the pinnacle of all things toasty. Discovering this golden gem is like finding the holy grail of carbs.

name: Bread
description: A humble loaf of bread. It's not much, but it's yours. Perfect for toasting, or just for admiring in your inventory. Collecting bread has never been this satisfying!

name: Bread Slice Keychain
description: A tiny, perfect slice of bread turned into an adorable keychain. It‚Äôs too cute not to collect!

name: Breadiginal
description:
Only baked during the first month after launch, this bread is the mark of early adventurers. A symbol of your place among the original players.

[color=#FF2C2C][list][*]Doesn't drop anymore.[/list][/color]

name: Breadiginal Badge
description:
[i][color=#d4a373]‚ÄûAwarded to the true pioneers of bread appreciation!‚Äù[/color][/i]

This exclusive badge is a mark of honor for those who played the game within the first month of its release. As one of the original players, you helped lay the foundation for this journey. Wear it with pride, knowing you're among the Bread Originals‚Äîthose who saw the potential of the loaf before anyone else.

name: Breer
description:
A hearty fusion of bread and beer, the Breer is born! A playful blend of two beloved staples, this unique loaf combines the rich taste of bread with a subtle hint of beer. It's the perfect collectible for those who appreciate a good brew with their daily bread!
[color=#FF2C2C][list][*]Doesn't drop anymore.[/list][/color]

name: Banana Bread
description:
[i][color=#ffe135]‚ÄûA fruity twist on a classic staple!‚Äù[/color][/i]

This special loaf combines the wholesome goodness of bread with the sweet, tropical flavor of bananas. A perfect addition to any collection, it's a delightful reminder that even the simplest things can have a delicious surprise!
[color=#FF2C2C][list][*]Doesn't drop anymore.[/list][/color]

name: The Flour Jar
description: An antique jar filled with premium flour, straight from the finest bakeries.

name: Rainbow Bread
description:
[i][color=#FFD700]‚ÄûSomewhere over the rainbow... there's bread!‚Äù[/color][/i]

This colorful loaf is a rare sight in the bread world. A dazzling mix of colors baked into a single slice, it's a feast for the eyes and a treat for collectors. Legend says it‚Äôs made from flour found at the end of a rainbow.

name: Cozy Loaf
description:
This bread knows how to survive the winter!
[i]Cozy Loaf[/i] is the cutest loaf on the shelf, sporting a fluffy pom-pom winter hat. Not only does it stay warm through the frosty months, but it somehow looks even more delicious! Does the extra cozy hat give you more clicks? Nope, but every click just feels a little bit happier.

name: Crumbs the Pet Pigeon
description:
This adorable little pigeon follows your bread everywhere, ready to snatch up any leftover crumbs! üê¶üçû
A loyal [i](and slightly greedy)[/i] friend, Crumbs adds an extra dash of charm to every click.

[b][color=#cc3300]Warning:[/color][/b] [i]May distract you with its cuteness![/i]
description_hungarian:
Ez az aranyos kis galamb mindenhov√° k√∂veti a kenyeredet, k√©szen arra, hogy elcsenjen minden elhullott morzs√°t! üê¶üçû
H≈±s√©ges [i](√©s kicsit moh√≥)[/i] bar√°tod, Morzsa minden kattint√°shoz hozz√°ad egy csipetnyi b√°jt.

[b][color=#cc3300]Figyelem:[/color][/b] [i]K√∂nnyen elvonhatja a figyelmedet a cukis√°g√°val![/i]

name: Toasty Slippers
description: Keep your loaf‚Äôs feet nice and toasty with these comfy bread slippers! ü•øüçû Perfect for those long clicking sessions when your loaf just needs to relax in style. Plus, they squeak a little with each click!

name: Butter Knife
description:
A trusty butter knife that‚Äôs always ready to spread some joy - or butter!
 It might not help you slice through life‚Äôs challenges, but it sure looks sharp next to your bread. Perfect for when you need that little extra spread of motivation.

name: Toaster
description: An elegant toaster that perfectly complements any bread lover's kitchen. This shiny appliance not only makes the perfect toast but also adds a stylish touch to your countertop. The toaster emits a soft glow, making every morning toast preparation feel special. Its design is modern yet cozy, as if each slice of toast is a mini treasure. This collectible is a must-have for any true bread enthusiast's collection!

name: Celestial Breadboard
description: A breadboard crafted from interstellar wood infused with cosmic energy. The surface of the board features softly glowing constellations that appear as the light hits it, as if the map of the universe unfolds before your eyes. This unique, mystical item is not just for slicing bread ‚Äî it imbues each slice with celestial power, transforming ordinary bread into an extraordinary experience. Only the rarest players can possess this iconic relic, a supreme trophy for true bread devotees.

name: Space Loaf
description: Get ready for a cosmic journey with the Space Loaf! This bread has traveled straight from the depths of the galaxy, packed with stardust and interstellar magic. Its vibrant color palette shines like peering out of a spaceship window at the Milky Way, while its texture tells you that this is not just bread, but a true universal wonder! The Space Loaf not only decorates your table but also becomes your favorite astronaut food! Feel like an explorer as you take a bite out of the stars!

name: Marbled Rye
description: Introducing the latest artistic creation in the bread world, the Marbled Rye! This loaf is not only delicious but also a true spectacle on the table. With its deep purple and creamy beige marbling, every slice feels like a new masterpiece! Even Picasso would envy this work of art! Enjoy it for breakfast, and you‚Äôll forget that plain white bread ever existed. Plus, the Marbled Rye could easily win the grand prize at any bread-making competition if it weren‚Äôt so busy enchanting taste buds everywhere!

name: Dragon Toast
description: The Dragon Toast is not just any bread; it's a real dragon! This bread marvel shines in bold, vibrant colors and is guaranteed to spice up your morning routine. Perfect for when you feel like you need a little fire in your life! While other breads just sit on the table, the Dragon Toast proudly displays its wings and sparkling scales. A bite of this magical delight, and you‚Äôll feel like the greatest dragon rider around the dining table! Make your breakfast legendary and set the tone for an enchanting day ahead!

name: Blueberry Bread
description:
Get ready to feast your eyes on the deliciousness that is, Blueberry Bread! This loaf is not just your average bread; it's like a berry-filled celebration in every slice! Imagine if a blueberry decided to throw a party, and this loaf was the guest of honor ‚Äî it's bursting with juicy blueberries that seem to dance with joy as you take a bite.
Not only does it look like a colorful masterpiece, but it also tastes like a sweet summer day, making your taste buds do the happy dance. Perfect for breakfast, brunch, or any time you need a berry good mood boost! Just be careful‚Äîone slice may lead to another, and soon you‚Äôll find yourself in a blueberry bliss spiral. So, grab a slice, and let the berry magic take over your day!

name: Fiery Hot Pepper Bread
description:
Get ready for a flavor adventure! This loaf is a bold red masterpiece, packed with sizzling peppers that deliver a spicy kick in every bite. With bits of jalape√±os and habaneros, it‚Äôs like a mini fiesta in your mouth!
Perfect for those who crave heat, this bread shines toasted with butter or alongside your favorite chili. Just a heads-up: one slice might have you exclaiming, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm on fire!‚Äù So, grab a loaf and spice up your meal!

name: Frosted Unicorn Bread
description:
Step into a magical world with this enchanting loaf! With its vibrant pastel colors and shimmering frosting, this creation is like a fairy tale on your table. Each slice reveals swirls of soft pink, lavender, and baby blue, reminiscent of a rainbow after a summer rain.
Topped with a sprinkle of edible glitter, it‚Äôs the perfect treat for those who believe in a little magic. This delightful bread is as sweet as a unicorn‚Äôs dream and pairs wonderfully with a dollop of whipped cream or as a show-stopping centerpiece at any celebration. Just one bite, and you‚Äôll feel like you‚Äôre galloping through a field of rainbows‚Äîpure bliss in every slice!

name: Sponge Loaf
description: Prepare for a delightful surprise that‚Äôs as soft and bouncy as your favorite sponge! This creation boasts a texture so airy and fluffy, it‚Äôs practically begging to be squished. Perfect for soaking up soups or spreading a generous layer of butter, it‚Äôs the ultimate sidekick for any meal. With its subtle sweetness and golden crust, this loaf is a fun addition to your table ‚Äî just don‚Äôt be surprised if it disappears faster than you can say ‚Äúsponge cake!‚Äù

name: Butterfly Bread
description: Prepare to be enchanted by this whimsical treat! Shaped like a lovely butterfly, it brings a touch of magic to any meal. With a soft, pillowy texture and a sprinkle of flour to mimic delicate wings, it‚Äôs perfect for picnics or as a cute snack for the young (or the young at heart). Just be careful not to let it flutter away!

name: Herb Focaccia
description: Calling all flavor adventurers! This creation is like a garden party for your palate. With its golden crust and fluffy interior, it‚Äôs topped with a riot of fresh herbs that‚Äôll make your taste buds do a happy dance. Drizzled with olive oil, it‚Äôs the perfect accompaniment to any meal or a stand-alone star at your dinner table. Who knew bread could be this fancy? Get ready to impress your friends and family with this herbaceous delight!

name: Pizza Slice Bread
description: Get ready to take a flavorful trip to pizza paradise without the guilt! This creation captures all the cheesy goodness of your favorite slice, but in a charming loaf form. With a golden crust that‚Äôs perfectly crispy and a soft, doughy interior, it‚Äôs topped with vibrant tomato sauce and a melty layer of cheese, adorned with pepperoni or colorful veggies for that extra flair. Whether you‚Äôre enjoying it as a snack, a side, or on its own, this loaf is guaranteed to satisfy those pizza cravings without the need for delivery. Just slice, serve, and watch it vanish!

name: Pillow Loaf
description: Get ready to snuggle up with this irresistibly soft creation! This loaf is like a cozy cloud of deliciousness, with a texture so pillowy, you might mistake it for your favorite pillow. Perfect for breakfast toast or an afternoon snack, it promises a comforting bite that feels like a warm hug. With its subtly sweet flavor and fluffy interior, it‚Äôs the ideal companion for jams, spreads, or just a sprinkle of sugar. Just be careful not to nap on it‚Äîit‚Äôs too tasty to resist!

name: Bubblegum Bread
description: Step right up for a whimsical taste adventure that‚Äôll take you back to childhood! This creation is a colorful delight, bursting with the sweet, nostalgic flavor of bubblegum. With its vibrant pink hue and soft, chewy texture, it‚Äôs perfect for those who believe that life should be a little more playful. Whether you‚Äôre enjoying it as a snack, toasted with butter, or even as a party treat, this loaf adds a pop of joy to any occasion. Just one bite, and you‚Äôll be floating on a sugary cloud of happiness‚Äîno chewing required!

name: Coral Reef Loaf
description: Dive into a flavor adventure with this stunning creation that brings the beauty of the ocean right to your table! With its bright, multi-colored exterior resembling the vibrant hues of a coral reef, this loaf is not just a feast for the palate but also a visual masterpiece. Infused with hints of tropical fruits and a touch of sea salt, each slice offers a taste of paradise. Perfect for summer picnics or as a conversation starter at dinner parties, this loaf transports you to a sun-soaked beach, making every bite a splash of deliciousness!

name: Neon Circuit Loaf
description: Get ready to power up your taste buds with this vibrant creation that‚Äôs sure to light up any meal! Bursting with electric colors and an eye-catching design, this loaf channels the energy of a neon-lit dance floor. Infused with zesty flavors that pop with every bite, it‚Äôs a perfect blend of fun and flavor. Whether enjoyed as a standalone snack or paired with your favorite spread, this loaf is a playful twist that brings a spark of excitement to your dining experience. Just one bite, and you‚Äôll be dancing with delight!

name: Lava Rock Loaf
description: Prepare to be blown away by this fiery creation that brings the heat to your plate! With a rugged, dark crust resembling molten rock, this loaf is infused with rich, smoky flavors that add depth and intensity to every bite. Inside, you'll discover a soft, warm texture that perfectly contrasts the exterior. Perfect for pairing with hearty stews or enjoying as a standalone snack, this loaf is a volcanic explosion of taste that‚Äôs sure to ignite your culinary adventures. Just be warned ‚Äî once you start, you might find it hard to resist the temptation to devour the whole thing!

name: Gemstone Crust Loaf
description: Step into a world of luxury with this dazzling creation that shines brighter than your favorite jewels! Adorned with a stunning crust that sparkles like precious gemstones, this loaf is as beautiful as it is delicious. With flavors that dance between sweet and savory, every slice is a treasure waiting to be discovered. Whether you serve it at a fancy dinner party or indulge in it on a cozy night in, this loaf adds a touch of elegance to any occasion. Get ready to impress your guests and treat yourself to a slice of edible art!

name: Frosty Bread
description: Get ready to chill with this delightfully frosty creation! With its dazzling icy blue and white color scheme, this loaf looks as if it was plucked straight from a winter wonderland. Its surface sparkles with shimmering frost and glistening icicles, giving it an enchanting, otherworldly appearance. Scattered snowflakes dance across the loaf, adding to its frosty charm. Wrapped snugly in a light blue scarf, it exudes a calm and cool vibe, making it the perfect treat for those cold winter days. Embrace the chill and indulge in this frosty delight!

name: Phoenix Bread
description: Rise from the ashes with this legendary loaf! The Phoenix Bread is a vibrant masterpiece, bursting with fiery reds, oranges, and yellows that evoke the essence of a mythical phoenix in flight. Its surface is adorned with intricate patterns that resemble swirling flames, making it a sight to behold. With a slightly textured finish that suggests the look of feathers, this loaf embodies both beauty and power. Perfect for those who dare to embrace their inner fire, this bread promises to bring warmth and inspiration to your culinary adventures. Experience the magic of rebirth with every bite!

name: Brearth
description: This loaf captures the essence of the planet itself, with vivid blues for the oceans and lush greens for the continents, all wrapped in a smooth, globe-like design. Swirling white clouds and icy poles complete the look, making it feel like you're holding a tiny version of Earth. A visual treat that‚Äôs almost too stunning to slice into!

name: Goofy Bread
description: This loaf is the epitome of silliness, sporting an oversized, whimsical grin that stretches from crust to crust. Its mismatched, cartoonish eyes give it a comically bewildered look, making it impossible not to smile back. With a playful tongue sticking out and crooked eyebrows that add to its goofy charm, this loaf is a delightful reminder that sometimes, laughter is the best ingredient! Perfect for brightening up any meal, it‚Äôs the ultimate companion for those who believe in the joy of food and fun.

name: Moldy Bread
description: This loaf showcases an unappetizing mix of dull browns and grays, accented by vibrant green patches that mimic fuzzy mold. Its uneven, craggy surface tells a story of neglect, evoking curiosity and a hint of repulsion. A humorous reminder that not all bread is created equal, this one is best left for the compost pile!

name: Chocolate Bread
description: Indulge in this delightful creation that boasts a rich, velvety chocolate exterior, perfect for satisfying sweet cravings. Its luscious texture melts in your mouth, while hints of cocoa dance on your taste buds. Ideal for breakfast or a decadent treat, it‚Äôs a chocolate lover‚Äôs dream come true!

name: Honeycomb Bread
description: This bread is a sweet and golden marvel, resembling a honeycomb structure with its unique hexagonal patterns. Its surface is lightly glazed, giving it a shiny appearance. The aroma of fresh honey fills the air, making it an irresistible treat that‚Äôs perfect for breakfast or as a snack.

name: Spooky Ghost Bread
description: This whimsical bread takes the form of a friendly ghost, complete with ghostly features and a light, fluffy texture. Its pale, soft exterior is decorated with cute, cartoonish eyes and a playful smile, making it the perfect addition to any Halloween celebration. Each bite is delightfully airy and slightly sweet, adding a fun twist to traditional baked goods.

name: Zombie Bread
description: This loaf is a must-have for any undead enthusiast! With a taste that‚Äôs both bold and daring, it boasts an otherworldly flavor that awakens the taste buds from their slumber. Perfect for midnight snacks or Halloween feasts, it‚Äôs the bread that keeps on giving‚Äîeven after the grave!

name: Submarine Bread
description: Dive into this unique loaf that captures the essence of underwater exploration! With a texture reminiscent of a soft, buoyant submarine, it‚Äôs perfect for both adventurous meals and nautical-themed parties. This bread adds a splash of creativity to any dish, making it the ideal companion for all your ocean-inspired snacks!

name: Treasure Chest Bread
description: Unlock the charm of this whimsical loaf that resembles a treasure chest brimming with delicious secrets! Its golden crust hints at hidden delights within, perfect for holding sweet or savory fillings. This playful creation adds a touch of adventure to any meal, making it the ultimate treasure for your taste buds!

name: Deep Fried Bread
description: This indulgent treat boasts a crispy, golden exterior that beckons with the aroma of savory goodness. Perfectly fried to achieve that satisfying crunch, it‚Äôs a guilty pleasure that will have players craving more. With each bite, a delightful warmth spreads, making it an irresistible comfort food in any kitchen!

name: Mosaic Bread
description: A stunning work of art that transforms every loaf into a vibrant masterpiece! Adorned with colorful tiles that mimic a mosaic, each piece tells its own story. It‚Äôs not just a treat for the taste buds; it's a feast for the eyes, making every meal feel like a celebration of flavor and creativity!

name: Mythical Forest Bread
description: A whimsical creation that brings the enchantment of a magical woodland to your table! Infused with the essence of mythical creatures and lush greenery, this loaf features delicate swirls of earthy colors and hints of forest herbs. Each bite transports you to a serene glade, where flavors dance like fairies under a canopy of ancient trees. Perfect for those seeking a taste of adventure!

name: Time Warp Bread
description: This loaf is a culinary time machine, blending flavors from different eras into one delicious slice! With vibrant, swirling patterns that evoke images of time travel, each bite transports you to a unique moment in history. Expect a mix of ancient grains and modern ingredients, creating a delightful juxtaposition of textures and tastes that will leave you pondering the past and dreaming of the future. Perfect for those who want their meals to be an adventure through time!

name: Camouflage Bread
description: You might not see it at first glance... or the second. This loaf blends seamlessly into its surroundings, whether it's a kitchen counter or a forest floor. Perfect for those stealthy picnics or avoiding snack time thieves. Just don‚Äôt lose it ‚Äî seriously, you might never find it again!

name: Garlic Bread
description: The most flavorful loaf in the game! Just one whiff of this toasty masterpiece will have everyone in a 10-mile radius running... towards or away from you, depending on their vampire tendencies. Delicious, powerful, and socially risky ‚Äî it‚Äôs a recipe for adventure!

name: Vanilla Croissant
description: A bite of French elegance. Warning: stare too long and it‚Äôll seduce you into grabbing it off the screen... and into your hand!

name: Cocoa Croissant
description: A chocolate lover‚Äôs dream! Croissant and cocoa in one delicious form ‚Äî it should be illegal. Good luck stopping once you start clicking!

name: Autumn Leaves Bread
description: The essence of fall, baked into a loaf. Crunchy like a pile of leaves, but way tastier [i](and no raking required)[/i]!

name: Cucumbread
description: A bread that‚Äôs trying to pass as a cucumber. It‚Äôs green, it‚Äôs fresh, but don‚Äôt be fooled ‚Äî it's still very much bread!

name: Cinnamon Swirl Bread
description: Cinnamon lovers unite! A swirl of sweetness in every bite, it‚Äôs like eating a cozy autumn morning.

name: Caramelized Onion Bread
description: Sweet and savory, with just the right amount of crunch. Perfect for the onion enthusiast who also craves carbs!

name: Sandwich
description: The classic multitasker. Perfect for sandwiches, toast, or just staring at while wondering what to eat next. It‚Äôs bread that holds your meal together ‚Äî literally.

name: Sushi Bread
description: Is it sushi? Is it bread? It's both! A fusion of two food worlds that probably never should‚Äôve met, but now you can‚Äôt unsee it. Bread rolls have never been so exotic.

name: Toothpaste Bread
description: Minty fresh! This loaf comes with a refreshing twist. Warning: not actually toothpaste. Probably shouldn't spread it on a toothbrush either.

name: Gyros Pita
description: A full meal in a single click! This pita isn't empty ‚Äî it‚Äôs packed with juicy gyros, ready to satisfy your virtual cravings. No need to go to Greece, just add more clicks!

name: Cheddar Loaf
description: Bread and cheese: the ultimate power couple. Sharp, cheesy, and ready to be devoured. This loaf is cheddar than the rest.

name: Pepperoni Bread
description: Pizza‚Äôs carb-loving cousin. Filled with pepperoni goodness, it‚Äôs like a mini slice of pizza in every bite. Perfect for when you‚Äôre too lazy for toppings.

name: Spicy Jalape√±o Loaf
description: Bread with a kick! Jalape√±o slices baked right in, so every bite brings the heat. You might sweat a little, but it'll be worth it.

name: Garden Bread
description: Freshly picked from your backyard! Topped with grass and colorful garden flowers, it‚Äôs the most organic loaf you‚Äôll ever see ‚Äî perfect for anyone who wants their bread to taste like nature [i](literally)[/i].

name: Meteorite Bread
description: Freshly baked in the fiery heart of a star, this loaf has crash-landed straight from outer space. A bit crunchy on the outside, but packed with cosmic flavor on the inside! Handle with caution ‚Äî may contain stardust.

name: Celestial Crown Loaf
description: Fit for a celestial ruler, this loaf sparkles like the night sky and tastes like a heavenly dream. Each bite is an otherworldly experience, making you feel like you‚Äôre snacking on the universe itself! Just don‚Äôt try to wear it as a crown!

name: Faded Bread
description: This stunning loaf features a mesmerizing gradient of vibrant colors ‚Äî from fiery reds to cool blues ‚Äî that will brighten any meal. Each slice is like a work of art, combining flavor with a rainbow of hues. Perfect for those who want their bread to be as beautiful as it is delicious!

name: Cyber Bread
description: Welcome to the future of carbs! This tech-savvy loaf is infused with binary flavors and neon colors, making it the ultimate snack for gamers and gadget lovers. With a crust that's both crunchy and sleek, it might just short-circuit your taste buds!

name: Ocean Wave Bread
description: Surf‚Äôs up with this loaf that captures the essence of the sea! With a swirl of ocean blue and sandy beige, each bite is like a vacation for your taste buds. Infused with a hint of salt and sea breeze, it‚Äôs perfect for beach lovers who can‚Äôt get enough of that salty goodness!

name: Jungle Vine Loaf
description: Swing into flavor with this adventurous loaf, adorned with vibrant green vines and a hint of tropical sweetness! Each bite is a wild escape into the jungle, bringing the essence of lush foliage and exotic fruits to your table. Perfect for those ready to unleash their inner explorer!

name: Aquarium Bread
description: Dive into a delicious ocean of flavor with this loaf that resembles a vibrant underwater scene! Adorned with colorful aquatic designs and a hint of sea salt, each slice transports you to a watery wonderland. Just remember: it‚Äôs best enjoyed on dry land!

name: Nebula Dream Bread
description: Blast off into a cosmic flavor journey with this otherworldly loaf! Swirling with hues of purple, blue, and gold, it‚Äôs like tasting the universe itself. Each slice offers a fluffy texture and a sprinkle of stardust ‚Äî perfect for dreamers and space enthusiasts alike!

name: 2024 Halloween Bread
description:
Get ready for a spook-tacular treat with this exclusive Halloween Bread! Shaped like a playful pumpkin loaf, it glows eerily from within and features a mischievous jack-o'-lantern face.

[i]Dropped only for a limited time from October 29 to November 2, 2024.[/i]

[color=#FF2C2C][list][*]Doesn't drop anymore.[/list][/color]

name: Bread Earrings
description: Perfect for any carb-lover‚Äôs collection! These crispy little slices dangle stylishly, so you can wear your bread and eat it‚Ä¶ just kidding, don‚Äôt eat them. But they‚Äôll certainly make you look delicious!

name: Sourdough Socks
description: Keep your feet warm with socks that look like they just came out of the oven! With a design inspired by sourdough holes, they‚Äôre full of flavor ‚Äî just not the edible kind.

name: Grain Grinder
description: Grind your grains in style! This mini grinder will make you feel like a master baker, even if all you do is sprinkle a bit of flour on your toast. Perfect for adding an artisanal touch to your kitchen.

name: Golden Rolling Pin
description: Why roll dough with a boring pin when you can use pure golden glory? This tool screams ‚Äúluxury baker‚Äù and will make your cookies feel extra special. Bonus: it shines like your culinary future.

name: Baguette Baton
description: The ultimate weapon in food fights! This crispy, golden baguette-shaped baton makes you look fierce in any bread battle. Warning: not as soft as it looks, proceed with caution.

name: Breadcat Plushie
description: Is it bread? Is it a cat? It's both! Hug this adorable Breadcat Plushie to enjoy the best of two worlds: a purring loaf that never goes stale. Perfect for cuddling and kneading.

name: Toast Helmet
description: Feeling a bit ‚Äúcrusty‚Äù? Protect your noggin with this toast-shaped helmet. It won‚Äôt stop real blades, but it might make people butter you up. Wear it and defend yourself from hunger‚Ä¶ or just bad jokes.

name: Galactic Oven Mitts
description: Bake like a cosmic pro with these space-themed mitts. Whether you‚Äôre pulling bread out of the oven or reaching for the stars, these mitts protect you from more than just burns ‚Äî like cold, boring kitchens.

name: Infinite Bread Basket
description: A basket that never runs out of bread! Too good to be true? Almost. Marvel at its endless supply of carbs that only exists in your imagination. No actual bread refills provided ‚Äî sorry, no infinite carbs here!

name: Bronze Bundle
description:
Includes these items:

[color=#CD7F32][list][*]Bread Slice Keychain[*]Bread Earrings[/list][/color]

name: Silver Bundle
description:
Includes these items:

[color=#C0C0C0][list][*]Cozy Loaf[*]Toasty Slippers[*]Butter Knife[*]Sourdough Socks[*]Grain Grinder[/list][/color]

name: Gold Bundle
description:
Includes these items:

[color=#FFD700][list][*]The Flour Jar[*]Golden Rolling Pin[*]Baguette Baton[/list][/color]

name: Platinum Bundle
description:
Includes these items:

[color=#B76E79][list][*]Crumbs the Pet Pigeon[*]Toaster[*]Breadcat Plushie[*]Toast Helmet[/list][/color]

name: Diamond Bundle
description:
Includes these items:

[color=#B9F2FF][list][*]Celestial Breadboard[*]Galactic Oven Mitts[*]Infinite Bread Basket[/list][/color]

name: Golden Crouton of Excess
description: For those who have far too much dough [i](pun intended)[/i] and an unexplainable urge to own a 100-dollar bread crumb. Completely pointless, undeniably shiny. Only the most financially reckless dare to collect this excessive relic of wealth!

name: Dev's Signature Loaf
description: Handcrafted by the creator themself, this loaf bears the unmistakable mark of genius. It‚Äôs not just bread ‚Äî it‚Äôs a statement. Only those deemed worthy can claim this signature slice, only in the hands of the few who know how to trade wisely.

name: 2024 Contributors' Bread
description: A special bread awarded to players who contributed to the development of the game, whether through guides, skin designs, or sharing screenshots. A delicious symbol of community collaboration!

name: USA
description:
These flag charms are the ultimate way to show off your patriotic pride... or just your love for colorful accessories! These charming little trinkets hang proudly from your bread, waving the flag of your chosen country like a tiny, edible ambassador. Whether you're clicking for points or just admiring the aesthetic, these charms bring a fun splash of national pride to your loaf.

Each charm proudly sports the colors of a different nation's flag, and who knows? Maybe they'll make your bread click faster. Or not. But hey, at least your bread looks like it‚Äôs ready for the Olympics!

name: Hungary
description:
These flag charms are the ultimate way to show off your patriotic pride... or just your love for colorful accessories! These charming little trinkets hang proudly from your bread, waving the flag of your chosen country like a tiny, edible ambassador. Whether you're clicking for points or just admiring the aesthetic, these charms bring a fun splash of national pride to your loaf.

Each charm proudly sports the colors of a different nation's flag, and who knows? Maybe they'll make your bread click faster. Or not. But hey, at least your bread looks like it‚Äôs ready for the Olympics!
